name: [Upgraded] BigBlue 3 USB Ports 28W Solar Charger(5V/4.8A Max), Portable Foldable Solar Panel for Camping, IP44 Waterproof, Compatible with iPhone 11/XS/XS Max/XR/X/8/7, iPad, Samsung Galaxy LG etc.

Used High-quality Solar Cell: The solar cells BigBlue adopted improve the solar charger’s durability by reducing heat buildup, making them more robust and less prone to damage, which extends their lifespan. Without metal lines on the front, these cells capture more sunlight, enhancing electricity generation and providing a sleek, modern design.

Higher Solar Conversion: Upgraded solar panels convert up to 25.4% of solar power into free energy in enough sunlight, which is the most durable panels at present, standing up to elements and wear and tear better than conventional panels. BigBlue uses a special polymer surface to protect solar panels from occasional rain or wet fog ( The junction box is not waterproof)

Portable Camping Solar Charger: With a folded size of 11× 6×1.4in and a lightweight (1.5 lbs) design, it is compact and light enough to fit into any camping backpack or hiking daypack. It is also a must-have for stashing in an emergency kit. BigBlue solar phone charger is a great option if you’re taking an extended camping trip or traveling somewhere with an unreliable power grid

Wide Compatibility: BigBlue USB solar charger offers a tiny power plant that can generate power for your phone (Android and Apple), power bank, speakers, and other small electronics to keep them charged when the sun is out (Note: we don't provide the lightning cable for Apple devices). Our portable solar charger can't store electricity and can't charge laptops and power station

Package & Support: You will get a BigBlue 28W Solar Panel Charger, a 50cm USB-A to USB-C Cable, four Carabiners, a User Manual and our friendly customer service. Note: Any clouds, the angle toward sunlight, operating temperature and sunlight intensity will affect the real output, we don't suggest you use this foldable solar panel inside of a window or windscreen

Perfect for Outdoor Adventures: From camping and trekking to emergency backup power, this solar panel combines portability, reliability, and high-output charging to keep your devices powered wherever you go.

name: MARBERO 200W Portable Solar Panel for Power Station & DC Devices 200 Watt Foldable Solar Charger >23% High Efficiency IP68 Waterproof Compatible with Solar Generator for Camping RV Outdoor Cloudy
short_description: RELIABLE POWER IN SUN OR SHADE: The 200 watt solar panels remains highly efficient, even on cloudy days. When exposed to full sunlight at the optimal angle (45 to 65 degrees), it can deliver up to 160-200W of power. On overcast days, it continues to provide 130W-140W, ensuring your devices stayed powered, no matter the weather conditions.

HIGH CONVERSION EFFICIENCY: The MARBERO 200w solar panel foldable is equipped with monocrystalline silicon, PET coating and constructed of high efficiency solar arrays, conversion rate is up to more than 23% of solar powr into electrical energy. Additionally, this camping solar panel is build in smart IC chip intelligently identifies your devices, and maximizes its charging speed while protects your devices from overcharge, overcurrent, short circuit, over temperature and overload. The built-in smart charging technology can provide optimal and 100% safe charging in direct sunlight.

DURABLE & WIDE USE: The 200 Watt foldable solar charger utilizes PET coating material and is made of high quality IP68 waterproof oxford fabric, which is not only waterproof but also dustproof, long-lasting durability and hard-wearing. The portable solar panels can withstand light rain and snow as well as perfect for outdoor activities such as camping, hiking, picnics, caravan, RV, car, boat, off-grid living and unexpected power outages. However, the output control box is not waterproof,in order to prolong the lifespan of 200watt solar panel, please don't soak it into water.

3-FOLD, PORTABLE & CONVENIENT: The 200 watt portable solar panel is designed for ultimate portablity. It folds into three sections, reducing to a compact size of 17'' x 23'' x 1.75'' and weighing just 13.41 lbs—about the size and weight of a typical carry bag. Equipped with a handle for easy transport, it's perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, and more, without taking up space. The 200 watt solar panel kit also includes 3 adjustable kickstands, allowing you adjust the angle for up to 23% more sunlight capture compared to flat pacement. NOTE: This 200w solar panel does not store electricity.

COMPATIBLE WITH MOST SOLAR GENERATORS: The MARBERO 200W portable foldable solar panels for power stations integrates 4 types of output cables (DC7909, MC4, Anderson, XT60), making it suitable for a wide range of portable power stations / solar generators, such as Jackery, DJI, EcoFlow, BLUETTI, and more. Additionally, the 18V DC Output is perfect for powering devices like car refrigerators and air pumps, ensuring your DC devices stay charged and ready to use—no wall outlet required.

VERSATILE CABLES: With 4 types of output cables, this solar panels 200 watts compatible with most solar generators/portable power stations on the market. For example, Anderson XT60 Adapter works with ECOFLOW (DELTA & RIVER SE), Anker SOLIX C1000, BLUETTI (AC200P/AC200MAX/EB150/EB240) and Jackery Explorer (1000/1500/2000 Pro), and 8mm DC Adapter is for Jacckery Explorer (160/240/300/500/1000). The 200W folding solar panel an ideal choice for outdoor and daily use with devices from MARBERO and others.
PACKAGE INCLUDED: 1 x MARBERO 200W Portable Solar Panel, 1 x User Manual.

PLEASE NOTE: Some portable power stations have a maximum input power limit. Even when using our 200W solar panel under ideal sunlight conditions, the energy intake of these staions may not exceed their specified maximum input, which could be less than 200W. This does not indicate an issue with the power output of our 200 watt solar panel, Before placing an order, we strongly recommend confirming the specifications of your power station, expecially checking for any maximum input power restritions.
